transcript:
Hi, if you record your name and reason for calling, I'll see if this person is available.
Ha sir please call me.
Thanks. Please stay on the line.
Hello?
Haa Ashish sir Himanshu baat kar raha hu sir business agent India Mart se.
Haa.
Ji wo price Rahul ne diya tha aapko final.
Haa haa.
Ji ji trust jo aapka basic ka do saal ka sir 50000 plus GST discount karke 60000 ka hai. Ye mera kab subscription kab khatam ho raha hai abhi jo current wala hai?
Ek second sir.
Sir ye aapka sir 13th ko complete ho raha hai.
Hello.
Thik hai thik hai mai aap se baat karta hu na abhi mai bahar hu mai lena hai lekin abhi mai baat nahi kar sakta mai call karta hu aapko thik hai. 
To kab call kar lu aapko sir? 
Mai ek hafte baad call karunga aapko final kar lenge usi din payment dal ke thik hai agle Thursday ko.
Agale Thursday ko thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know subscription expiry date.



Resolution:

- Executive informed the customer about subscription expiry.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next Thursday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, expiry, payment
